item.title: Seeding User and Role Data with seed-fu
item.author: mark@markrichman.com (Mark Richman)
item.description: Seed-fu is advanced seed data handling for Rails, combining the best practices of several methods together. Here’s how to use seed-fu with users and roles (I use Authlogic and acl9):
